com.ece.superkids.users

Interface ParentManager

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    FileParentManager

    public interface ParentManager
    The ParentManager allows interactions as a parent user.
    Author:
    Ben Duong
     

    • Method Summary

    • Method Detail

      • doesParentExist

        boolean doesParentExist()
        Checks for the existence of a parent account.
        Returns:
        True if the parent user exists, false otherwise.

      • checkParentPassword

        boolean checkParentPassword(String password)
        Check a password against the stored parent password.
        Parameters:
        password - the password to check
        Returns:
        True if the passwords match, false otherwise.

      • changeParentPassword

        boolean changeParentPassword(String newPass)
        Change the parent password.
        Parameters:
        newPass - the new password to use.
        Returns:
        True if successful, false otherwise

      • deleteParentAccount

        void deleteParentAccount(boolean wait)
        Delete the parent account.
        Parameters:
        wait - true if immediate action, false if wait until exit of application

      • setRecoverQuestion

        boolean setRecoverQuestion(RecoveryQuestion question)
        Set the recovery question to use.
        Parameters:
        question - the question to use
        Returns:
        True if question saved successfully, false otherwise.

      • getRecoveryQuestion

        RecoveryQuestion getRecoveryQuestion()
        Get the recovery question.
        Returns:
        The parent's recovery question.
